commit f2e20cc49cc703b8e4bff0afcd376dc83b8e5a63
Author: Mark Story <mark@sentry.io>
Date:   Thu May 30 14:35:38 2019 -0400

    chore(south) Update south state to use new jsonfield (#13466)
    
    Update all the south snapshots to reference the new JSONField
    implementation. This makes it possible to remove jsonfield library in
    the future and removes the effected tables from being caught in the next
    south diff.
    
    Refs SEN-686

diff --git a/src/sentry/db/models/fields/jsonfield.py b/src/sentry/db/models/fields/jsonfield.py

+++ b/src/sentry/db/models/fields/jsonfield.py
@@ -139,4 +139,4 @@ class JSONField(models.TextField):

     from south.modelsinspector import add_introspection_rules
-    add_introspection_rules([], ['^sentry\.db\.models\.fields\.JSONField'])
+    add_introspection_rules([], ['^sentry\.db\.models\.fields\.jsonfield.JSONField'])
